name: OR_LOG_ISOLTN_STAT
description: The OR_LOG_ISOLTN_STAT table contains OR management system log patient isolation status.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log that the isolation status refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the isolation status in the surgical log.

columns.name: ISOLATION_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value that refers to the isolation statuses of the infection in the surgical log.
